byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Netherlands fears German attacks on trawlers is prelude to laying of new mine fields
snippet: AMSTERDAM, the Netherlands, April 1--An atmosphere of fear and suspicion prevailed in Netherland fishing ports today as a result of recent German attacks on Netherland trawlers, none of which could possibly have been mistaken for an enemy vessel a...

headline.main: NETHERLANDS VISIONS NEW NAZI MINE FIELD; Trawler Attacks Laid to Desire to Clear Zone for Operations

lead_paragraph: AMSTERDAM, the Netherlands, April 1--An atmosphere of fear and suspicion prevailed in Netherland fishing ports today as a result of recent German attacks on Netherland trawlers, none of which could possibly have been mistaken for an enemy vessel and none of which was working for the British market.
